page.title: 18THE LEISURE SURVEY 17-40
page.content: All the people we interviewed wanted a leisure centre in Holywood. Some wanted playing fields as well. The people we asked belonged to the "Hob", a local club. They thought there should be a swimming pool, a court for netball, basketball and squash, a coffee bar, an ice rink and indoor and outdoor equipment. The reasons they wanted a leisure centre in Holywood were, - it was cheaper; it would get young people off the streets; you would not have so far to travel and the unemployed could save money instead of spending it on the bus fare to and from Belfast; it would provide a lot of new jobs; be more convenient and keep up the community spirit.
